metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1782 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise versions 1.5.0 up to 1.5.2 allowunauthenticated users to bypass intended ACL authorizations for clusterswhere mTLS is not enabled. This issue is fixed in version 1.5.3.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
